channel.title: In need of client side help!
channel.description:
b4 anyone flames about me using BeyondRSC source, im using it because i like how its been set out and learning from certain errors etc....
but yeah anyway ive got a problem that ive ran into. one which i dont know wot to do lol. basically i go to lava maze and at random times i end up lagging bad then it shows a black popup box then sometimes a shop window then dc's u out.
i get this error code. if any1 can help me with this i wud be very thankful :)
[java] centrepara: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8225 [java] java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8225 [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.GameImage.drawBoxTextColour(GameImage.ja va:1695) [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawServerMessageBox(mudclient .java:6751) [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGameWindowsMenus(mudclient .java:6864) [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.drawGame(mudclient.java:2541) [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.mudclient.method4(mudclient.java:1010) [java] at org.rscdaemon.client.GameWindow.run(GameWindow.java:315) [java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

item.title: In need of client side help!
item.dc:creator: @ghostfire ghostfire
